overview: "Twelve Miles to Trona‚Äù finds Wim Wenders back in his early road movie mode with a visually revved-up story about a young man who has unwittingly overdosed on drug-laced cookies and is trying to get to a hospital before they take their full, heart-racing effect.  Included in the omnibus movie "Ten MInutes Older: The Trumpet"
title: Twelve Miles to Trona
